entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
